**Antique Appraisal Services Directory – Norfolk, VA**  

### Overview  
Norfolk offers specialized antique appraisal services through established firms focusing on art, collectibles, estate items, and personal property valuation[2][6][9]. Key specialties include insurance valuations, estate planning assessments[2][6], auction estimates[2][10], IRS compliance reports[6], and expert consultations for unique collections[9].
